documentation.text: @return the address of the token that is able to be staked
@return the address of the token that is able to be staked

params.amount: Amount of tokens to remove from staking
params.vega_public_key: Target Vega public key from which to deduct stake

stake(uint256,bytes32).details: Emits Stake_Deposited eventUser MUST run "approve" on token prior to running Stake

params.vega_public_key: Target Vega public key to be credited with the stake

returns._0: the address of the token that is able to be staked

params.new_address: Target ETH address to recieve the stake
params.vega_public_key: Target Vega public key to be credited with the transfer

remove_stake(uint256,bytes32).notice: This removes specified amount of stake of available to user

stake(uint256,bytes32).notice: This stakes the given amount of tokens and credits them to the provided Vega public key

transfer_stake(uint256,address,bytes32).notice: This transfers all stake from the sender's address to the "new_address"

userdoc.notice: This contract manages the vesting of the Vega V2 ERC20 token
